multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: commodities; Santos' robust LNG pricing at $11.57/mmbtu and accelerated oil production at Pikka support higher energy supply, lifting WTI and Brent by 1–3% over the next 3 months (July–September 2025), while global cost inflation pressures feed into US inflation expectations.
